actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to repeal the act terminating Federal supervision over the property and members of the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon as a federally recognized Indian tribe, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Siletz Restoration Act - Repeals the Act terminating Federal supervision over the property and members of the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon. Reinstates the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon as a federally recognized Indian tribe. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the act terminating Federal supervision over the property and members of the Confederated Tribes of Siletz Indians of Oregon as a federally recognized Indian tribe, and for other purposes.
